name: SFSafariViewControllerDelegate
desc: A protocol used to implement custom event handling for a Safari view controller.

items.name: func safariViewController(SFSafariViewController, didCompleteInitialLoad: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the initial URL load completed.

items.name: func safariViewController(SFSafariViewController, activityItemsFor: URL, title: String?) -> [UIActivity]
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user tapped an Action button.

items.name: func safariViewControllerDidFinish(SFSafariViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user dismissed the view.
